headlines: Verizon is more than the best wireless network. We are a global team of problem-solvers, engineers, technologists, and innovators.

museums-and-institutions.headline: After acquiring AOL, last year we went on to acquire Yahoo, FreeBee Data, Complex Media, XO Communications, Volicon, ExpressFleet, Fleetmatics, and formed a joint venture— Verizon Hearst Media Partners.

educational-database.headline: We are rapidly growing in the areas of mobility, cloud, video & advertising, broadband & fiber, IoT, and managed security— while making groundbreaking strides in 5G technology.

mobile-app.headline:
Wait, what?
Yes, we're a rising tech company and we're not stopping there.

browse-and-collect-fairs.headline: In this new ecosystem of ever-evolving needs for complex machine-to-machine and IoT solutions, Verizon is moving quickly to stay ahead of increasing demands.

bringing-together.headline: We're on a mission to monetize our networks and become a unique technology leader, while improving lives and growing shareholder value.
